name: Co10r Royale
description:
Ten Champions arrive in the Labyrinth of Co10r. these ten will participate in a ritual where you must eliminate your nine other opponents using the power of the ten colored orbs. each orb has a special trait that makes it useful for surviving the ritual. the sections of the labyrinth are an illusion to hide the labyrinth's true form. 

NM Game Jam - Theme - TEN
Co10r Royale is a fast paced battle royale game utilizing colored gumballs as special abilities. There are 10 different colors that serve as the basis for the abilities each of the players pick up.  To see what each of the abilities do please make sure to click on the how to play button on the title screen.
